description: This file contains CSS styles for theme management and layout for a Tic Tac Toe application, defining styles for various UI components like the game board, squares, and buttons.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styles for the App component, setting background color, text alignment, and layout properties.

classes.name: game-status
classes.description: Styles for displaying the game's status, including font size and color.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Styles for the game board layout, using a grid to arrange squares.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for each square in the Tic Tac Toe game, including dimensions and hover effects.

classes.name: restart-button
classes.description: Styles for the restart button, including padding, font size, and hover effects.
